title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 865/1999 of 26 April 1999 allocating quotas for tomatoes for processing among the Member States for the 1999/2000 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 865/1999
of 26 April 1999
allocating quotas for tomatoes for processing among the Member States for the 1999/2000 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1999/2000 marketing year, pursuant to Article 6(3) of Regulation (EC) No 2201/96, the quotas shall be apportioned as set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 April 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
